snippet: Arrests early Thursday, including that of a 15-year-old boy, were related to what police officials said was a plot to carry out an attack in Sydney.
abstract: Australian authorities arrest two men, including 15-year-old boy, on terrorism charges after raiding their homes in suburban Sydney.
lead_paragraph: Arrests early Thursday, including that of a 15-year-old boy, were related to what police officials said was a plot to carry out an attack in Sydney.

headline.print_headline: Police Raids in Australia Lead to Arrests
headline.main: Australian Police Charge Five After Counterterrorism Raids
